entities.name: cedric
entities.description: Cedric's body is lying some twenty feet away from Harry.

entities.name: triwizard cup
entities.description: The Triwizard Cup is glinting in the starlight, some way beyond Cedric.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry's wand is on the ground at Cedric's feet.

entities.name: robes
entities.description: A bundle of robes that Harry thought was a baby is close by, at the foot of the grave.

entities.name: baby
entities.description: Harry initially thought the bundle of robes was a baby.

entities.name: wormtail
entities.description: Wormtail's fast, wheezy breathing is growing louder again.

entities.name: snake
entities.description: A gigantic snake is slithering through the grass, circling the headstone where Harry is tied.

entities.name: headstone
entities.description: The gigantic snake is circling the headstone where Harry is tied.

entities.name: cauldron
entities.description: Wormtail is pushing a stone cauldron to the foot of the grave.

relationships.description: Cedric's body is lying some twenty feet away from Harry.
The Triwizard Cup is glinting in the starlight, some way beyond Cedric and Harry.
Wormtail is pushing a stone cauldron to the foot of the grave.
